body_html: No worries! I think your commit is good to go to solve the bug for now. The offset for curandStatePhilox wasn't being reset when doing THCRandom_manualSeed, which your code takes care off. My change utilizes Runtian's Philox module from the JIT compiler and I would have to ensure that my manualSeed() call, resets the offset as well.
body_text: No worries! I think your commit is good to go to solve the bug for now. The offset for curandStatePhilox wasn't being reset when doing THCRandom_manualSeed, which your code takes care off. My change utilizes Runtian's Philox module from the JIT compiler and I would have to ensure that my manualSeed() call, resets the offset as well.
body: No worries! I think your commit is good to go to solve the bug for now. The offset for `curandStatePhilox` wasn't being reset when doing `THCRandom_manualSeed`, which your code takes care off. My change utilizes Runtian's Philox module from the JIT compiler and I would have to ensure that my `manualSeed()` call, resets the offset as well.
